price: Дедилар: «Қўрқма. Биз сенга бир билимдон бола ҳақида хушхабар олиб келдик».
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا تَوۡجَلۡ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū lā tawjal innā nubashiruka bighulāmin ʿalīmin
